text: N’akarorero kabamwe batanga amatungo yabo barondera impuhwe z’Imana hamwe nugutsimbataza imitima yabo, ni nk’akarorero k’umurima uri hejuru washikirwa n’imvura nyinshi hanyuma ukazana ibiterwa vyayo incuro zibiri n’izirenga, rero iyo mvura idashikiwe n’imvura nyinshi niyo nkeya irahagiza, n’Imana niyo ibona ivyo mugira vyose
